verses.verse: For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> will <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We will <S%H398>eat<s%> our own <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3847>wear<s%> our own <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> let us be <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H622>take<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> our <S%H2781>reproach!<s%>"

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H9469>beautiful<s%> and <S%H9202>glorious,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> [will] be the <S%H1347>pride<s%> and the <S%H8597>adornment<s%> of the <S%H6413>survivors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that he who is <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and <S%H3498>remains<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> â€“ <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H3789>recorded<s%> for <S%H9132>life<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H518>When<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> has <S%H7364>washed<s%> <S%H7364>away<s%> the <S%H6675>filth<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H1740>purged<s%> the <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from her <S%H7130>midst,<s%> by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1197>burning,<s%>

then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4349>area<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> her <S%H4744>assemblies<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> even <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> for <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> will be a <S%H2646>canopy.<s%>

And there will be a <S%H5521>shelter<s%> to [give] <S%H6738>shade<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and <S%H4563>protection<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm<s%> and the <S%H4306>rain.<s%>
